description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to any major within the College of Education & Professional Studies who is also an Oklahoma resident. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate or graduate student within the College of Education and Professional Studies Must be majoring in one of the following programs: Early Childhood Education, Elementary Education, Teaching and Learning PK - 6, Special Education, Bilingual Education/ TESL, Educational Leadership, Library Media Education, Reading or Secondary Education Oklahoma resident Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
